column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Sokka says : " I just want to say , good effort out there today , Team Avatar ! "
#Text=Katara says : " Enough with the Team Avatar stuff .
#Text=See it 's good because it 's got " Aang " in it .
#Text=Boomeraang .
#Text=" Aang says : " I kind of like that one .
#Text=" Katara says : " Let 's talk about this on our way into the city .
#Text=" Sokka says : " The Aang Gang ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Sokka ... " Sokka says : " The Fearsome Foursome ?
#Text=" Toph says : " You 're crazy .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Why ?
#Text=We 're fearsome !

#Text=" Main Aang Iroh Jet Katara Longshot Momo Smellerbee Sokka Toph Zuko Antagonists Azula Mai Qin Ty Lee says : " Minor Fire Nation engineers Hope Sung Than Than 's sister Terra Team soldiers Ticket woman Ying " Katara says : " Waterbending bomb !
#Text=Yeah !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Sure , five thousand year - old maps from the spirit library .
#Text=Just splash some water on 'em .
#Text=" Katara says : " Sorry .
#Text=" Aang says : " So , did you figure out what route we 're going to take ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Okay , we just got out of the desert , so we must be around here .
#Text=And we need to go to Ba Sing Se , which is here .
#Text=It looks like the only passage connecting the south to the north is this sliver of land called the Serpent 's Pass .
#Text=" Toph says : " You sure that 's the best way to go ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " It 's the only way .
#Text=I mean , it 's not like we have Appa to fly us there .
#Text=" Katara says : " Shush up about Appa .
#Text=Ca n't you at least try to be sensitive ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Katara , it 's okay .
#Text=I know I was upset about losing Appa before , but I just want to focus on getting to Ba Sing Se and telling the Earth King about the solar eclipse .
#Text=" Katara says : " Oh ... well , okay .
#Text=I 'm glad you 're doing better .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Then to Ba Sing Se we go .
#Text=No more distractions .
#Text=" Than says : " Hello there , fellow refugees !
#Text=" Aang says : " So , you guys are headed to Ba Sing Se , too ?
#Text=" Than says : " Sure are .
#Text=We 're trying to get there before my wife Ying has her baby .
#Text=" Katara says : " Great !
#Text=We can travel through the Serpent 's Pass together .
#Text=" Ying says : " The Serpent 's Pass ?
#Text=Only the truly desperate take that deadly route !
#Text=" Toph says : " Deadly route .
#Text=Great pick , Sokka !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Well , we are desperate .
#Text=" Than says : " You should come with us to Full Moon Bay .
#Text=Ferries take refugees across the lake .
#Text=It 's the fastest way to Ba Sing Se .
#Text=" Ying says : " And it 's hidden , so the Fire Nation ca n't find it .
#Text=" Katara says : " Hmm ... peaceful ferry ride or deadly pass ?
#Text=" Katara says : " I ca n't believe how many people 's lives have been uprooted by the Fire Nation .
#Text=" Than says : " We 're all looking for a better life , safe behind the walls of Ba Sing Se .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Who would have thought after all these years , I 'd return to the scene of my greatest military disgrace ... as a tourist !
#Text=" Zuko says : " Look around .
#Text=We 're not tourists , we 're refugees .
#Text=Ugh !
#Text=I 'm sick of eating rotten food , sleeping in the dirt .
#Text=I 'm tired of living like this !
#Text=" Jet says : " Are n't we all ?
#Text=My name 's Jet and these are my Freedom Fighters , Smellerbee and Longshot .
#Text=" Smellerbee says : " Hey .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Hello .
#Text=" Jet says : " Here 's the deal .
#Text=I hear the captain 's eating like a king while the refugees have to feed off his scraps .
#Text=Does n't seem fair , does it ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " What sort of king is he eating like ?
#Text=" Jet says : " The fat , happy kind .
#Text=You want to help us " liberate " some food ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " I 'm in .
#Text=" Ticket lady says : " I told you already ... no vegetables on the ferry !
#Text=One cabbage slug could destroy the entire ecosystem of Ba Sing Se !
#Text=Security !
#Text=" Cabbage merchant says : " Ahhh !
#Text=My cabbages !
#Text=" Ticket lady says : " Next !
#Text=" Aang says : " Um , four tickets for the ferry to Ba Sing Se , please .
#Text=" Ticket lady says : " Passports ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Uh ... no one told us we had to have passports .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Do n't you know who this is ?
#Text=He 's the Avatar !
#Text=" Ticket lady says : " Ah , I see fifty Avatars a day and , by the way , not a very impressive costume .
#Text=Besides , no animals allowed .
#Text=Do I need to call security ?
#Text=" Aang says : " That wo n't be necessary .
#Text=" Ticket lady says : " Next !
#Text=" Toph says : " I 'll take care of this .
#Text=My name is Toph Beifong , and I 'll need four tickets .
#Text=" Ticket lady says : " Ah , the golden seal of the flying boar !
#Text=It is my pleasure to help anyone of the Beifong family .
#Text=" Toph says : " It is your pleasure .
#Text=As you can see , I am blind and these three imbeciles are my valets .
#Text=" Ticket lady says : " But , the animal - " Toph says : " - is my seeing - eye lemur .
#Text=" Ticket lady says : " Well , normally it 's only one ticket per passport , but this document is so official ... I guess it 's worth four tickets .
#Text=" Toph says : " Thank you very much .
#Text=" Sokka says : " All right , we scammed that lady good !
#Text=" Suki says : " Tickets and passports please .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Is there a problem ?
#Text=" Suki says : " Yeah , I got a problem with you !
#Text=I 've seen your type before .
#Text=Probably sarcastic , think you 're hilarious and let me guess , you 're traveling with the Avatar .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Do I know you ?
#Text=" Suki says : " You mean you do n't remember ?
#Text=Maybe you 'll remember this !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Suki !
#Text=" Suki says : " Sokka , it 's good to see you !
#Text=" Katara says : " You look so different without your makeup !
#Text=And the new outfit .
#Text=" Suki says : " That crabby lady makes all the security guards wear them .
#Text=And look at you , sleeveless guy .
#Text=Been working out ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Ahhh , I 'll grab a tree branch and do a few chin touches every now and then .
#Text=Nothing major .
#Text=" Aang says : " Are the other Kyoshi Warriors around ?
#Text=" Suki says : " Yeah .
#Text=After you left Kyoshi , we wanted to find a way to help people .
#Text=We ended up escorting some refugees and we 've been here ever since .
#Text=Hi , Momo !
#Text=Good to see you too !
#Text=So why are you guys getting tickets for the ferry ?
#Text=Would n't you just fly across on Appa ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Appa is missing .
#Text=We hope to find him in Ba Sing Se .
#Text=" Suki says : " I 'm so sorry to hear that .
#Text=Are you doing okay ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm doing fine .
#Text=Would everybody stop worrying about me ?
#Text=" Ying says : " Avatar Aang , you have to help us !
#Text=Someone took all of our belongings ; our passports , our tickets , everything 's gone !
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'll talk to the lady for you .
#Text=" Ticket lady says : " No passports , no tickets !
#Text=" Aang says : " But she 's pregnant and all of her stuff was stolen !
#Text=You have to make an exception !
#Text=" Ticket lady says : " No exceptions !
#Text=If I just gave away tickets willy - nilly to anyone , there would be no more order !
#Text=You know what that means , no more civilization !
#Text=" Aang says : " What if we gave them our tickets ?
#Text=" Ticket lady says : " No !
#Text=" Aang says : " But ... " Ticket lady says : " Next !
#Text=" Aang says : " Do n't worry , you 'll get to the city safely .
#Text=I 'll lead you through the Serpent 's Pass .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I ca n't believe we gave up our tickets and now we 're going through the Serpent 's Pass .
#Text=" Toph says : " I ca n't believe you 're still complaining about it .
#Text=" Suki says : " I 'm coming too !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Are you sure that 's a good idea ?
#Text=" Suki says : " Sokka , I thought you 'd want me to come .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I do , it 's just  " Suki says : " Just what ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Nothing .
#Text=I 'm glad you 're coming .
#Text=" Sokka says : " This is the Serpent 's Pass ?
#Text=I thought it would be a little more wind - y , you know , like a serpent .
#Text=Huh , I guess they misnamed it .
#Text=" Ying says : " Look at this writing !
#Text=How awful !
#Text=" Toph says : " What does it say ?
#Text=" Katara says : " It says , " abandon hope " .
#Text=" Ying says : " How can we abandon hope ?
#Text=It 's all we have !
#Text=" Aang says : " I do n't know .
#Text=The monks used to say that hope was just a distraction , so maybe we do need to abandon it .
#Text=" Katara says : " What are you talking about ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Hope is not going to get us into Ba Sing Se and it 's not going to help find Appa .
#Text=We need to focus on what we 're doing right now and that 's getting across this path .
#Text=" Katara says : " Okay , if you say so .
#Text=" Suki says : " The Fire Nation controls the western lake .
#Text=Rumor has it they 're working on something big on the other side of it and do n't want anyone to find out what it is .
#Text=" Than says : " I 'm okay !
#Text=" Sokka says : " They 've spotted us !
#Text=Let 's go , let 's go !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Suki , are you okay ?
#Text=You have to be more careful !
#Text=Come on !
#Text=" Toph says : " " Thanks for saving my life , Toph . "
#Text=Hey , no problem , Sokka .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Suki , you should n't sleep there .
#Text=Who knows how stable this ledge is , it could give away at any moment !
#Text=" Suki says : " Sokka , I 'm fine , stop worrying !
#Text=" Sokka says : " You 're right , you 're right , you 're perfectly capable of taking care of yourself !
#Text=Wait !
#Text=Oh , never mind , I thought I saw a spider , but , you 're fine .
#Text=" Smellerbee says : " Guard 's coming !
#Text=" Katara says : " You know , it 's okay to miss Appa .
#Text=What 's going on with you ?
#Text=In the desert , all you cared about was finding Appa and now it 's like you do n't care about him at all .
#Text=" Aang says : " You saw what I did out there .
#Text=I was so angry about losing Appa that I could n't control myself .
#Text=I hated feeling like that .
#Text=" Katara says : " But now you 're not letting yourself feel anything .
#Text=I know sometimes it hurts more to hope and it hurts more to care .
#Text=But you have to promise me that you wo n't stop caring .
#Text=Come on , you need a hug .
#Text=" Aang says : " Thank you for your concern , Katara .
#Text=" Suki says : " It 's a beautiful moon .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Yeah , it really is .
#Text=" Suki says : " Look , I know you 're just trying to help , but I can take care of myself .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I know you can .
#Text=" Suki says : " Then why are you acting so overprotective ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " It 's so hard to lose someone you care about .
#Text=Something happened at the North Pole and I could n't protect someone .
#Text=I do n't want anything like that to ever happen again .
#Text=" Suki says : " I lost someone I care about .
#Text=He did n't die , he just went away .
#Text=I only had a few days to get to know him , but he was smart and brave and funny ... " Sokka says : " Who is this guy ?
#Text=Is he taller than me ?
#Text=" Suki says : " No , he 's about your height .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Is he better - looking ?
#Text=" Suki says : " It is you , stupid !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Oh !
#Text=" Sokka says : " I ca n't .
#Text=" Suki says : " I 'm sorry .
#Text=" Sokka says : " No , you should n't be .
#Text=" Iroh says : " So , Smellerbee .
#Text=That 's an unusual name for a young man .
#Text=" Smellerbee says : " Maybe it 's because I 'm not a man ... I 'm a girl !
#Text=" Iroh says : " Oh , now I see .
#Text=It 's a beautiful name for a lovely girl !
#Text=" Smellerbee says : " I know , you 're right .
#Text=As long as I 'm confident with who I am , it does n't matter what other people think .
#Text=Thanks , Longshot .
#Text=" Jet says : " From what I heard , people eat like this every night in Ba Sing Se .
#Text=I ca n't wait to set my eyes on that giant wall .
#Text=" Iroh says : " It is a magnificent sight .
#Text=" Jet says : " So you 've been there before ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " Once .
#Text=When I was a ... different man .
#Text=" Jet says : " I 've done some things in my past that I 'm not proud of , but that 's why I 'm going to Ba Sing Se : for a new beginning .
#Text=A second chance .
#Text=" Iroh says : " That 's very noble of you .
#Text=I believe people can change their lives if they want to .
#Text=I believe in second chances .
#Text=" Katara says : " Everyone single file !
#Text=Aang , I need help !
#Text=" Katara says : " What is that thing ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " I think I just figured out why they call it the Serpent 's Pass !
#Text=Suki , you know about giant sea monsters , make it go away !
#Text=" Suki says : " Just because I live near the unagi does n't mean I 'm an expert !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Oh great and powerful sea serpent , please accept this humble and tasty offering .
#Text=Thank you .
#Text=" Katara says : " Sokka !
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'll distract it .
#Text=Katara , get everyone across !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Toph , come on , it 's just ice !
#Text=" Toph says : " Actually , I 'm going to stay on my little island , where I can see !
#Text=Okay , I 'm coming !
#Text=" Sokka says : " You 're doing great !
#Text=Just follow the sound of my voice !
#Text=" Toph says : " It 's hard to ignore .
#Text=" Sokka says : " You 're almost there !
#Text=" Toph says : " Help !
#Text=I ca n't swim !
#Text=" Sokka says : " I 'm coming , Toph !
#Text=" Toph says : " Help !
#Text=" Toph says : " Oh Sokka , you saved me !
#Text=" Suki says : " Actually , it 's me .
#Text=" Toph says : " Oh ... well ... you can go ahead and let me drown now .
#Text=" Sokka says : " There 's the wall !
#Text=Now it 's nothing but smooth sailing to Ba Sing Se .
#Text=" Ying says : " Oh no !
#Text=" Sokka says : " What 's wrong ?
#Text=" Ying says : " The baby 's coming !
#Text=" Sokka says : " What ?
#Text=Now ?
#Text=Ca n't you hold it in or something ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Sokka , calm down .
#Text=I helped Gran - Gran deliver lots of babies back home .
#Text=" Sokka says : " This is n't the same as delivering an arctic seal !
#Text=This is a real ... human ... thing !
#Text=" Katara says : " It 's called a baby and I helped her deliver plenty of those , too .
#Text=Aang , get some rags .
#Text=Sokka , water .
#Text=Toph , I need you to make an earth tent , a big one .
#Text=Suki , come with me .
#Text=" Jet says : " You know , as soon as I saw your scar , I knew exactly who you were .
#Text=You 're an outcast , like me .
#Text=And us outcasts have to stick together .
#Text=We have to watch each other 's backs .
#Text=Because no one else will .
#Text=" Zuko says : " I 've realized lately that being on your own is n't always the best path .
#Text=" Katara says : " You 're doing great , Ying .
#Text=Sokka , where 's that water ?
#Text=Now get ready to push .
#Text=One ... two ... ... three , push !
#Text=" Katara says : " It 's a girl !
#Text=" Toph says : " So , you want to go see the baby , or are you going to faint like an old lady again ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " No , no , I 'm good this time .
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang , you have to come see this .
#Text=" Toph says : " She sounds healthy .
#Text=" Katara says : " She 's beautiful .
#Text=" Sokka says : " It 's so ... squishy looking .
#Text=" Than says : " What should we name her ?
#Text=" Ying says : " I want our daughter 's name to be unique .
#Text=I want it to mean something .
#Text=" Aang says : " I 've been going through a really hard time lately .
#Text=But you 've made me ... hopeful again .
#Text=" Ying says : " I know what I want to name our baby now .
#Text=Hope .
#Text=" Than says : " That 's a perfect name .
#Text=Hope .
#Text=" Aang says : " I thought I was trying to be strong .
#Text=But really I was just running away from my feelings .
#Text=Seeing this family together , so full of happiness and love , it 's reminded me how I feel about Appa ... and how I feel about you .
#Text=" Aang says : " I promise , I 'll find Appa as fast as I can .
#Text=I just really need to do this .
#Text=" Sokka says : " See you in the big city .
#Text=" Toph says : " Say hi to that big fuzzball for me .
#Text=" Katara says : " You 'll find him , Aang .
#Text=" Aang says : " I know .
#Text=Thank you , Katara .
#Text=You ready , Momo ?
#Text=" Suki says : " Sokka , it 's been really great to see you again .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Whoa , hold on .
#Text=Why does it sound like you 're saying goodbye ?
#Text=" Suki says : " I came along because I wanted to make sure you got through the Serpent 's Pass safely .
#Text=But now I need to get back to the other Kyoshi Warriors .
#Text=" Sokka says : " So you came along to protect me ?
#Text=" Suki says : " Listen , I 'm really sorry about last night .
#Text=We were talking ... and saying things ... and I just got carried away and before I knew it - " Sokka says : " You talk too much .
#Text=" Aang says : " Sorry Momo , Appa 's going to have to wait .

#Text=" Main Aang Iroh Jet Katara Momo Sokka Suki Than Toph Ying Zuko Antagonists Fire Nation soldiers says : " Minor Cabbage merchant Hope Longshot Passport attendant Smellerbee Than 's sister " Bodyguard says : " Line 'em up for the warden !
#Text="
